modern_minimal.name: Modern Minimal Kitchen
modern_minimal.flooring: Large-format vitrified tiles with matte finish
modern_minimal.ceiling: Flat gypsum false ceiling with concealed panels
modern_minimal.lighting: Warm LED strip lights, under-cabinet lights
modern_minimal.cabinets: Handle-less modular cabinets with soft-close drawers
modern_minimal.prompt_keywords: modern minimal kitchen, handleless cabinets, quartz walls, warm LED lighting, clean lines, seamless design, integrated appliances, matte finish tiles

luxury_contemporary.name: Luxury Contemporary Kitchen
luxury_contemporary.flooring: Italian marble flooring, high-gloss vitrified tiles
luxury_contemporary.ceiling: Layered false ceiling with cove lighting
luxury_contemporary.lighting: Designer pendant lights, ambient LED lighting
luxury_contemporary.ventilation: Auto-clean chimney, fresh air ventilation system
luxury_contemporary.cabinets: High-gloss modular cabinets with smart storage units
luxury_contemporary.prompt_keywords: luxury contemporary kitchen, Italian marble floors, glass backsplash, high-gloss cabinets, designer pendant lights, marble textures, premium finishes, smart storage

scandinavian_style.name: Scandinavian Style Kitchen
scandinavian_style.flooring: Wooden laminate flooring, light tone vitrified tiles
scandinavian_style.ceiling: Simple flat ceiling with wooden beams
scandinavian_style.lighting: Natural light focus, soft white LED lights
scandinavian_style.cabinets: Light wood cabinets with open shelving
scandinavian_style.prompt_keywords: scandinavian kitchen, light wood cabinets, white subway tiles, wooden beams, natural light, pastel colors, open shelving, minimal design, cozy atmosphere

industrial_style.name: Industrial Style Kitchen
industrial_style.flooring: Concrete finish tiles, rustic vitrified flooring
industrial_style.ceiling: Open ceiling with black metal framework
industrial_style.cabinets: Matte black cabinets with metal shelves
industrial_style.prompt_keywords: industrial kitchen, exposed brick, concrete floors, black metal framework, track lighting, matte black cabinets, raw materials, urban loft style, heavy-duty appliances

budget_friendly.name: Budget-Friendly Smart Kitchen
budget_friendly.flooring: Anti-skid ceramic tiles, standard vitrified tiles
budget_friendly.prompt_keywords: budget-friendly kitchen, ceramic tiles, printed backsplash, PVC cabinets, energy-efficient lighting, practical design, space-saving storage, clean and functional
